snippet: Insurers suggest two reasons why allowing small businesses to offer employees a choice of plans might not be in the best interests of those businesses and their employees.
abstract: Insurers suggest two reasons why allowing small businesses to offer employees a choice of plans might not be in the best interests of those businesses and their employees.

headline.main: Businesses May Have to Wait to Offer Employees a Choice of Health Plans

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
